Class TextToSpeechManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosc345.app.model.TextToSpeechManager

  • public class TextToSpeechManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulate and manage text-to-speech.

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context parentContext,
                 Callback onStart,
                 Callback onDone)
        Set up the text-to-speech service.
        Parameters:
        parentContext - the parent context (Activity).
        onStart - the callback to called once TTS has begun.
        onDone - the callback to called once TTS has finished.
